title: aravinda lOcananE
sahitya:
aravinda lOcananE karuNai pozhi annai maruvum nIla mEniyanE


anupallavi

  nArAyaNA shrIman nArAyaNA enru piravip-pini aghaTrum tirunAmam uraittEn


caraNam    paTTa shirumai pOdAdO iniyun pakkattil azhaikkalAgAdO unnai
 viTTup-pirinda manam vADAdO padam toTTu vaNangum enaik-kaN pArAdO
